body.p: For the purpose of calculating basic earnings per share, the amounts attributable to ordinary equity holders of the parent entity in respect of:

li.p: profit or loss from continuing operations attributable to the parent entity; and
profit or loss attributable to the parent entity

body.p: shall be the amounts in (a) and (b) adjusted for the after‑tax amounts of preference dividends, differences arising on the settlement of preference shares, and other similar effects of preference shares classified as equity.
